column4: There are two printers on the machine: One is connected via USB, the second one (the new target) can be connected either by USB or TCP/IP.
Because there are about 100 users who have printer A set as their default and it would be much easier just to redirect the print jobs to printer B. (PS: It's "vlt" with "L")
Ok, I'l try that. Thanks. /VLT
what is wrong is that the upgrade manager is now wholy relliable especialy if you have removed the ubuntu-desktop meta package,  you'll need to clean install
The desktop package still exists. verything is fine after running `telinit 3`.
